article_title: Malcolm Gladwell On American Health Care

article_metadata.description: Malcolm Gladwell hasn't written much about American health care. In a rare sit-down interview, Dr. Robert Pearl quizzes Gladwell on the Affordable Care Act, Canadian health care, America's malpractice system and more.
article_metadata.author: Robert Pearl, M.D.
